choices: The family goes to an endless buffet.
The family goes to a party with extended family members
11.content:
Character: Hilda
Age: 16
Height: 5'0
Weight: 130

It was time for Thanksgiving at Hilda's house, and her family always prepares huge dinners she can barely eat.

Hilda's Family is very large, with super-low metabolisms, but she works hard to fight off fat and eats little. Her Mom, dad, and 15-year old twin sister Bertha all weight over twice as much as they should. Her family eats five meals a day; breakfast, brunch, lunch, dinner, and desert. Hilda's mother even dropped her daughters out of school because Bertha got too hungry to concentrate in school; school lunches never came close to filling her. So now the girls get home schooled.

For this Thanksgiving,
11.title: Thanksgiving

111.content: The family didn’t have much money. So they decided they could get a big meal at a buffet and it would be cheaper. When they walked in there wasn’t many other families there. The only ones that were there were other poor families because they had a special where if you came with your family it would be cheaper. So it was just Hilda’s family and a few other poor families in the buffet. When they got there the buffet had signs of a contest that was being held. It came along with their thanksgiving special where whatever family ate the most plates got discounted visits for the next year. And They servers made you fill up your plate with enough food so you couldn’t skimp out. Hilda’s family saw it and made it their goal to eat the most. As they were eating the people in the restaurant were counting how many plates each family was eating. Throughout the contest families would drop out left and right but Hilda’s family was one of the final families. At the end there were 2 families left. Hilda’s who had eaten 15 plates and the other family who had eaten 15 plates as well. But the other family had eaten their plates faster then Hilda’s so they would win if it ended in a tie. The other family had 6 people so they had an advantage but they didn’t have gluttonous family members like Hilda’s family. Hilda’s parents ate 4 plates each while Bertha ate 5 and hilda ate 2. Hilda was way smaller then her family members so she was full with only 2 but the rest of her family was also full and overweight so it was harder to get more food. Hilda has a third plate in front of her and she was trying to eat it for the family. Her mother said, “ Do it for the family sweetheart. “. And that’s all she needed. She finished her plate and the buffet cheered. She then fell asleep from eating so much.
111.title: The family goes to an endless buffet.

choices: Parents are okay with being overweight
1111.content: Hilda’s family was so proud of her. They were all astonished by her drive to finish her meal. Usually Hilda was in Bertha’s shadow literally and figuratively. She didn’t hate it as she wanted to stay trim and skinny but this new feeling intrigued her. She didn’t think that she longed for her parents attention but now that she had a taste she liked it. When she woke up for breakfast she sat down at her spot on the side of the table and her father said, “ you know what, since you helped out the family so much why don’t you sit at the head of the table today.” Hilda accepted even though her parents only rewarded Bertha by having her sit at the head of the table. They used it as a reward because it was the most comfortable chair in the house. She sat down and a huge stack of pancakes were already set down for her father. He said, “ You can have them, after all you deserve them.” Hilda ate the pancakes her stomach still extended from last night. Then her sister came down and they all ate breakfast. She ate the whole stack of pancakes which she usually never did.
1111.title: The next day

11112.content: The family sat down to eat lunch at the buffet with their discount pass. After lunch they had a discussion about their weight. Their mother had decided that they need to lose some weight as a family, accept Hilda of course. So they would eat healthier from now on. Their father agreed having not much choice in the matter and Bertha hated the idea. Being just under 300 Bertha objected to dieting. Her and her mother fought and it ended with their mother winning.
11112.title: Parents try to lose weight

1112.content: Hildas hefty family waddled into the buffet. It was thanksgiving again and over the year the family had gone to the buffet at least once every day. They usually went for only dinner but on weekends they went for at least 2 meals. They waddled in and used their discount card one last time. Their new habits had earned them some extra weight over the year. Their parents were about 250 pounds each, with their father being a little heavier. Then Bertha had gained about 30 pounds and she stood at about 320 pounds. Hilda’s parents and sister were all belly heavy so it was a little harder for hilda to tell how much she had gained when it all went to her backside. She was the odd one out being way smaller and bottom heavy unlike her family. She had gained 50 pounds bringing her weight up to 180. Since last Thanksgiving eating at the buffet with nothing but junk has only encouraged her gain. And with a family of hogs she was always eating the least.
1112.title: The next year

choices: Hilda wants to get back at the woman who beat her
11121.content: The server told Hilda’s family about the contest this year again. This one had much more advertisement then last years. So their family sat down at a table. Bertha had to sit in two chairs to support her wide build. They started the contest and filled up their plates. They were in the lead for most of the time but there were 2 groups not too far behind. One was a family of 5 and the whole family were grown ups. They weren’t obese or anything but it was a lot of people. The other group was just a husband and a wife. The husband was obese but the woman next to him was the biggest woman Hilda had ever seen. She had to have been like 500 pounds. But her family still had a decent lead on them. Their family was at 21 plates, their parents with 5 each, Bertha with 7 and Hilda with 4. They had taken a break because they were all so full even though Bertha was yelling at Hilda to eat another plate. “Hilda hurry up, your gonna lose us this contest if you don’t eat some more plates.” “ I Might be able to get one more, but only if we need it.” Said Hilda. The family of 5 had dropped out at 17 with a bunch of unbuttoned pants. There was only the giant woman left and she wasn’t slowing down. When she was at 20 Hilda got another plate. She was trying to eat more but was so full. “Hurry up she’s gonna best is and it’s gonna be your fault.” Said Bertha. By that time the woman was on her 22nd plate along with Hilda. They were both eating slowly as they were stuffed to the brim with food. Eventually they finished the plate but they finished at almost the exact same time. So that meant they had to get another plate. The man went up and got the last plate for her and Hilda waddled up there to get another plate. She sat down and slowly picked at the food. The taste wasn’t even there. She was so stuffed she couldn’t even taste the food. She saw that the other woman had finished the plate and she saw the food still left on her plate and opted out. The buffet cheered for the lady. Hilda looked over at her sister and saw the scowl she had on her face. “It’s all your fault” she said. Then she looked at her parents as they tried to hide their disappointment. Even though she had eaten as much as them she still seemed their approval. She had looked over at the woman as she was being helped out by her husband and the buffet staff and as they cheered her on. Hilda longed for that kind of praise.
11121.title: This years contest

choices: The family goes to the buffet on Christmas
Hilda went to the buffet by herself
111212.content: After the Thanksgiving competition Bertha was cruel towards Hilda. She would always Say things like, "skinny bitch” “your such a twig” “ what are you, anorexic?” “You don’t appreciate moms cooking”. Day by day Hilda got more and more mad. She was of course mad at her sister for the insults, but she was also mad at the huge woman that beat her.
111212.title: After the competition

choices: Watching the fat lady becomes a habit
The harassing at home goes to another level
1112122.content: A few days after thanksgiving and Hilda couldn’t handle it anymore. She had to get out of the house. So she drove around and saw the buffet. She had an idea. She went in and got a small table. She sat down and saw the obese woman that beat her. She was entranced by the food. Hilda went and got some food just to blend in with the fatties around her. As she ate the food she watched the woman plow through her own food. She could not believe her eyes, the woman was a machine. She looked around at all of the fatties around her and as she was peering around her fork hit the bottom of her plate. She had eaten all of her food. She went up to get another plate and sat back down to watch.
1112122.title: Hilda went to the buffet by herself

choices: The woman dropped the card on the floor
The woman said she was going on a diet
11121221.content: It’s New Years and almost every day Hilda has come to the buffet to watch the fat lady eat. They had a special on lobster today so it was decently packed. Hilda was once again eating and mindlessly watching the fat lady eat. She had gotten closer to the woman as time went on. She didn’t see the problem because the woman was so focused on the food that there was no way she had even seen Hilda. Hilda day and ate and glanced over at the woman as the night went on until the woman and man got up to leave. But what happened next shocked Hilda.
11121221.title: Watching the fat lady becomes a habit

111212211.content: When the man and the woman left, the card fell out of the woman’s purse. She saw the car leave through the window so she went to the table, and took the card. She sat back down and looked at it. She saw that this one was different from the last one. Instead of the discount it said that the meals were free. She knew they would be looking for it the next day. So she got there earlier than usual. They used to have to give it to a person but now she just had to swipe it like a credit card. The couple would usually come in at 6 every day so she got there at 5:30. Hilda has nothing else to do but wait she she got a plate and started to eat. Then she saw the couple arrive. Hilda was a little paranoid so she sat in the back this time. She watched the couple waddle through the big double doors. She found it amusing how the big woman had to walk through sideways even though the doors were enormous. They went to the front counter where you pay and Hilda watched her fumble around in her bag and have a confused look on her face. She saw the man say, “you probably left it at the house.” The woman was about to say something but just then she saw the food and told him to “just pay” so she could fill her gut. They paid regularly and went on with eating. Hilda wondered what they would do if they found out she took it.
111212211.title: The woman dropped the card on the floor

choices: The ignored it and someone cleaned it up
1112122111.content:
The next day, Hilda went in at 5:30, filled up a plate, and sat down at her table in the back. She was still a little paranoid so she was watching for the couple to come in. She figured that she must've been anxious because she finished her plate rather fast. Instead of getting one plate she went up and got 2 so she wouldn't have any more distractions for a while. The couple waddled in per usual and the woman spoke to the server. She had waddled up to the cash register with a purpose and a pissed off look on her face while her husband looked calm. A small woman walked out from a side room. Hilda assumed it was the manager. She walked up to the big woman and tried to calm her down. Hilda had to know what they were saying. So she got up and started to fill up yet another plate. She could hear the conversation a little bit. The Manager said, "sorry ma'am but we now sell those cards on our website. There’s no way of finding it if someone took the card but like I said earlier you may have just lost it.” Woman, “I didn’t lose it I know someone took it. It’s worth thousands of dollars someone must’ve taken it.”
“I recognize you so I can give you another card.” Said the manager. Just then, Hilda was listening so much that she wasn’t paying attention and her butt bumped into a table and knocked over a cup which landed on the floor and broke. The manager and the woman turned around and looked at her.
1112122111.title: The next day

11121221112.content: Hilda turned and saw the shattered cup but didn’t realize that she had bumped it. The two women we’re arguing about how the manager thought that the woman had just lost it and it wasn’t the buffet’s fault and how the big woman thought that someone stole it. Hilda walked away with a mischievous feeling knowing that nobody knew that she took it. Hilda sat down and started to eat her food. The woman was pissed she didn’t get another card so she stormed out of the restaurant. Hilda thought it was funny that she had to stop to turn sideways to get through the double doors. She ate her food and smiled knowing that she was using the woman’s card to eat food. She had this feeling that she really won in the end because she could eat the woman’s food and nobody would be the wiser. Hilda has eaten 6 plates of food that day feeling victorious over the woman.
11121221112.title: Alternate: No refunds

111212211121.content: Hilda’s family waddled into the buffet for their thanksgiving feast. Her parents waddled in first being about 10 pounds lighter then last year. Without the buffet every day their habits changed a bit. Then Bertha waddled in about 10 pounds heavier at 330. She was eating nonstop no matter if they were at the buffet or not. Then soon after Hilda had waddled in. She was a regular at the buffet but her family didn’t know this. After that day at the buffet when they fat woman had stumbled out in defeat, Hilda had went there every day to see if the fat woman would show up. And when she didn’t show up, Hilda would stuff her face with the ‘fat woman’s Food’ as she told herself. Every day she came and waited for the woman to come in for months, but she never did. And Hilda has never felt more proud of her revenge. Her family sat down at a table as the competition began. Hilda hadn’t seen the woman come in so she had assumed an easy victory. But then someone bursted through the doors. “Wait I’m here don’t start without me” yelled a woman. It was her, the huge fat woman. Hilda hadn’t seen her in months and it seemed that she had gained some weight. It was hard to tell because she was so big but Hilda assumed 50 pounds. The woman was stuck until some workers had to help her through. The woman and her husband, who was hidden behind her, sat down when the servers started to bring the food. It was different this year and Hilda was relieved because it had gotten harder and harder to get food herself. She saw the hunger of the obese woman had not slowed down since last time she saw her. Plate after plate Hilda would look over at the woman and she was a force to be reckoned with. About an hour later the competition was coming to an end. Hildas parents had eaten 9 plates combined and her sister had eaten 8 plates herself. Hilda has just started on her 7th plate. The family was at 23 plates. But they had to beat the obese woman’s 25 plates. Hilda saw the woman stop eating and she crowd that gathered around her and pushed herself. She ate and ate until she finished the plate. Then a server brought another one and set it in front of her. She saw the look of nervousness in the woman’s eyes and devoured the plate. The buffet cheered her on as the server set the next plate in front of her. It was fried chicken tenders, her favorite, she ate slowly as she was painfully full. She regretted eating the last plate so fast. She slowly ate and ate and ate until she was on her last piece of chicken. She picked it up with her fork and shoved the whole thing into her mouth. The crowd cheered and someone took a picture of her as she held her hands up in victory. She had eaten 9 plates, that’s more than Bertha. She saw the crowd cheer and her parents were ecstatic that their daughter won the contest for them. Right after she put her arms up in victory a button flew off on her pants and right when she was about to see what it was her chair made a cracking sound then...SNAP... Her chair broke and she had fallen on the ground. A few servers helped her up and the manager had given her family the special card and apologized about the chair.
111212211121.title: Next thanksgiving

1112122111211.content: Hilda woke up and got out of bed. Her bed creaked more and more as the weeks went on. She went downstairs expecting breakfast but she found her parents getting ready to leave. Hilda asked, “What are you guys doing?” Her mother replied with, “we’ve decided that since we get free meals at the buffet, why not go for every meal.” Hilda was not surprised by her family’s gluttonous behavior. Bertha was a heavy sleeper and she usually slept late so Hilda’s parents told Hilda to wake her up. “We will start the car, you try to wake your sister up and see if she wants to go.” Her father said. They walked out the door and Hilda walked to the stairs and looked up. She didn’t feel like walking all the way up to the top of the staircase and she had no energy yet so she decided to raise her voice and ask knowing it wouldn’t cause her sister to wake up. She then proceeded to walk out her front door. But she got stuck. “Come on Hilda it’s time to go.” Shouted her parents. She quickly panicked and pushed her way out of the doorframe. She looked back and hadn’t realized how small their doorframe was until now. She mentioned something to her parents and they said they would try to do something about it but they didn’t have a big budget. When the three arrived at the buffet they waddled through the wide double doors and swiped their card feeling like royalty. They got plates, sat down and dug in. They ate to their hearts content. Hilda was completely as she sat back in her booth and absentmindedly rubbed her belly. Her mother said, “ your done already? No no no. You can’t be done. You are the champion Hilda, you made this family proud. I’m going to get you some more.” She waddled to the food and came back with 2 more plates, “ go on eat, you deserve it.” “ Thanks mom, you know what, I do deserve it.” Hilda said as she leaned forward and Ate the rest of her food. They got back home just as Bertha had woken up and she was hungry. So an hour later they went back to the buffet for lunch. Hilda and Bertha has a contest to see who could eat the most. And since Hilda had been stuffed from the morning she had lost. But when they returned for dinner the girls had a rematch and Hilda just barely beaten her sister by a few bites. When they got up to leave Hilda needed help from her parents to lift up her stuffed 340 pound bulk up from the booth that she sat in as she sat there triumphantly.
1112122111211.title: The next day

choices: The fat woman has a plan
11121221112111.content: Hildas parents waddled through the double doors of the buffet eager to stuff themselves on thanksgiving. Then the belly heavy Bertha followed weighing at about 350 pounds. She was followed by Hilda who lumbered into the buffet with her bottom heavy build. Over the year Hilda’s family had been going to the buffet every day. Her and her sister had a competition to see who could eat the most for what turned out to be almost every meal. In the beginning it had been close but as time went on Hilda’s competitiveness had won out. During the past few months Bertha didn’t even come close to Hilda, she was an eating machine. She walked through the double doors as he hips brushed the sides of the doorframe. They all waddled and took their seats. Hilda sat on the booth per usual. They always had to push the table out for Hilda. So the competition began. Hilda had gone to town. She wasn’t even paying attention the the competition. She had gone into a trance with all of the food being brought to her. When she snapped out of it she realized her family had won by a landslide. As a family they had eaten 34 plates. Hilda has eaten 14 plates. The second best was the obese woman and her husband who had eaten 25. The fat woman glared at Hilda as she had been lifted up by her parents and she waddled out with the card.
11121221112111.title: Next thanksgiving

112.content:
"Dinners done! Come and get it!"

Bertha waddles down the stairs as fast as she can in her gym shorts and sweatshirt, and Hilda hesitantly walks down in jeans and a t-shirt.

They see the spread on the table.
Three deep-fried turkeys, four bowls of mash, two bowls of stuffing, six cans of cranberries, three pumpkins, four bowls of corn and butter, a bowl of gravy, and two hams.

Hilda sat down, and her plate (which was the size of a pizza) was already filled with at least ten pounds of food.

(Hilda doesn't know it, but her mother put a powder in her food to make her want to eat it)
112.title: The family Eats at home.

1121.content:
Hilda starts eating, at first slowly, but then rapidly.
She forgets everything about her diet and digs into her plate. She eats everything, has to unbutton her pants, and gets seconds. She feels her belly filling up with fatty foods and drinks. After fourths, Hilda realizes that she had enough. She goes upstairs to wash up, and realizes that her jeans no longer zip or button up! She runs to her closet to grab a pair of sweats to fit her bloated belly.

Downstairs, she is greeted to half a cake sitting on her plate. Hilda tries to say no, but her mouth is filled with cake before she can say a word. Hilda finishes the cake, her belly fuller than before.
1121.title: Dig in

choices: Her chair broke breaking the spell of food.
Mother runs out of food temporary breaking the spell
11211.content: Kids foods ready!!! Said her mother from downstairs Hilda and her sister waddle/walk to the dining room table to find it as full as it was yesterday or was it? Yesterday's meal had left her brain foggy on what day it was and she thought it was thanksgiving.(Again roll with it you can make it so every day is thanksgiving or make thanksgiving a normal everyday course across the globe.)So she went to eatting two whole turkeys and 5 kinds of pie makeing her stomach ride her shirt up and expand her sweats a good 5 inches all around and she was not stoping after awhile she fal asleep but when she woke up the cycle continued on until.
11211.title: The next day THANKSGIVING AGAIN(Roll with it!)

112111.content: Hildas chair broke when she hit 270 . Her hips were expanding too quickly over the months until her chair couldn't handle it anymore. when she found out what was happening she tried to put a stop to it but her mom just stuffed some turkey in her mouth and she fell under the spell again. Their mother then bought reinforced chairs. Even though her other daughter, Bertha, didn't mind the food at 320 pounds.
112111.title: Her chair broke breaking the spell of food.

11213.content:
"Girls! Come down! Thanksgiving dinner is ready!"
A year has passed, and Hilda has been gaining lots of weight. She now outweighs her 240 pound sister by 20 pounds.
They waddle down the stairs in matching stretchy shorts and t-shirts; they're now hard to tell apart.

They sit down to a larger feast than last year.

Hilda doesn't use the fork, instead she uses her chubby fingers to eat everything on her plate. She eats all her food plus seconds and pie. She tries to thank her parents, but her chubby cheeks were still full of food.

She washes up and goes upstairs to weigh herself "Wow, 265! I gained five pounds, awesome!"
Hilda stopped caring about losing weight and has been trying to beat her sister to 300 pounds. Being her weight, it's hard for her to go far without getting tired, so she spends most of her time sitting down watching TV with ice cream.
11213.title: Next thanksgiving.........

choices: Go through a day at their school
112131.content:
Hilda and Bertha were now back at school. Their mother put them in an all-girl's highschool for girls of their size so they could eat more in school and have classes adjusted to them (Cooking class, then lunch, Art, second lunch, and then baking class)
They're also in the after school sumo wrestling program.
112131.title: One week later

choices: Hang out with friends at mall
Hilda's mother takes her to a waterpark to celebrate her good grades.
1121311.content:
First period-
Hilda walked into her cooking class. She sat at her table with her friends. Today's assignment was pizza. She finished with an A and ate her entire pizza.

Second period-
Hilda waddled through the lunch line with all the other girls. She got her plate filled with three burgers, a mound of fries, and a milkshake. She gobbled it down with her friends, all as fat if not fatter than her. A girl who was new to the school was at her table. She was only 160 or so pounds, and the girls at the table were trying to plump her up and made sure she was stuffed with plenty of fries.

Third Period-
Art, not particularly interesting, moving on.

Fourth period-
Hilda sat back down at her table. This time they were serving spaghetti and garlic bread. Hilda's friend, Stacy, sat next to her. She needed two chairs for her blubbery ass, both dedicated to one cheek. Keep in mind, the chairs were already extra wide. She was clearly pear-shapped; with most of her weight in her legs and ass. She actually had the arms and face of a thinner girl. But certainly not the appetite of one. She scarfed down two meals.

Fifth period-
Hilda, and her classmates, all baked pies. They, again, got to eat them. A's again.

Wrestling-
Hilda put on her xxxl gym shorts and sleeveless shirt, and slipped off her shoes.
She was paired up with her friend Stacy.

The two tackled eachother, their blubbery bodies slamming into each other and giggling like jelllotine. Hilda's arms wrapped half the way around Stacy's huge ass and they both fell to the ground. They squirmed around for a bit, then Hilda was able to lock Stacy's arm behind her head. She had won!
1121311.title: Go through a day at their school

choices: Hilda keeps packing on the pounds over the years while  Bertha isnt far behind
Hilda is huge, she doesn't stop gaining when she is eating more of berthas food
112132.content: Another year passes and Hilda is 18 years old. Their mother called them down to eat for thanksgiving. They waddle down the stairs very slowly as they couldnt go too fast. They had to. Buy a biger table to fit all of the food. Hilda gets to the table first because she is bigger. She had to get new pants because they were too hard to button. Hilda beat her sister to 300 pounds. She now weighs 330 pounds and counting. And her sister weighs 290.
112132.title: Reader's choice

12.content: Fi Sword:A 14 year old 149 pound DD size bust girl who loves Halloween with a passion that shines a thousand suns and is a magnet for finding candy hotspots.Getter Kaiser:A young 9 year old who is just getting into the session loves sweats and chocolate.Madalen Kaiser:Getter`s 16 year old big sister and Fi`s best friend has a impossible JJ size bust and loves cakes,fruits,and candy people.
12.title: Halloween

124.content:
So many ways a figure watching female can fatten up on Halloween...

A mother's restraint slackens as she handles the trick or treat candy

Young and mature girls can find their sexy costumes tightening at parties
124.title: more

1241.content:
It was late October and Anne was strolling down the aisles of the grocery store acquiring her usual items. It was then that Anne noticed a sign "All halloween candy half off." Anne was a fit 28 year old mother of two weighing in at 120pounds. She practiced stern discipline and exercised regularly but she was incredibly thrifty and could not resist the urge that compelled her to buy a dozen bags of candy. Anne had no intention of consuming the sugary confections herself but rather be an altruist and give out generous portions to all the cute little kids. Now in possession of a huge collection of candy, Anne awaited Halloween.

It was Halloween night and Anne set up her front door and saw her kids off to go trickor treating themselves. Piles of candy laid beside Anne who remained uninterested in the colorful wrapped treats. However something Anne didn't plan on occurred.

Thunder boomed and lightning cracked, kids yelled as they ran home escaping the torrent of cold rain.

"Oh my god what will I do with all this candy?" exclaimed Anne picking up a candy bar.

"Hmmph might as well." Anne pouted.

Anne unwrapped a piece of candy and popped it in her mouth. Utterly unaccustomed to candy, Anne became overwhelmed by its sweetness.

"MMMM! oh wow that was tasty!" Anne squealed quickly unwrapping another.

Anne's abstain from junk food had left her vulnerable to its temptation thus leading to her candy binge.
1241.title: mother loses discipline

12411.content:
Over the week Anne devoured the entire supply of candy. The candy had turned Anne's trim body into a form of flabby flesh. A chunky Anne walked the grocery store again feeling slightly embarasshed no longer being the thin housewife any more. Anne had went from a fit 120 pound woman to a fat 160 pound lady.

"Ugh I swear everyone is looking at me." Anne thought feeling self conscious.

All Anne could think about was how badly she gave in. How her fit body was smothered in adipose. She felt her butt jiggle and her boobs bounced atop her wobbly belly something she didn't experience a week earlier. Her clothes were really tight resulting in eye grabbing bulges.

"I guess I'll just have to diet." Anne stated as she pushed her cart filled with health food.

It was than that Anne noticed a sign...

"All Halloween candy must go! 90% off"

Anne stared helplessly at the candy.

Later that night Anne was laying in a huge pile of candy shoving handfuls in her mouth.
12411.title: a week later

choices: Her kids come home, but she takes their candy
12412.content: An even bigger Anne answers the door as little trick or treaters come to the door. Over the past year, Anne has lost her self control and hasn't been eating healthy. She went from 120 pounds to 200 pounds and she hasn't realized it. This Halloween she is munching on candy while handing it out.
12412.title: next halloween

choices: Anne's costume catches the eye of some parents
Anne gets a big tummy ache and needs a rub
124121.content: Anne continued her decent and by next Halloween she created 300 and was hovering around 330 pounds. The kids still loved coming to her house because she always had so much candy. They didn't pay any mind to the fact she had gotten so big, or was eating more candy than ever. Anne wasn't paying any attention to her waist either as she continued to munch on King size candy bars.
124121.title: Next Halloween

choices: Let them eat cake Memorial Day
125.title: Another holiday

13.content:
Choose a girl:

There is:

Holly, the Christmas elf. She is a little lazy and is not very creative. She is a bit of an air head and kind of naive but she is very nice.
She is 4'4" tall(Elves are kind of tall) She weights 74 pounds and has a pretty even figure.

Mrs. Lisa Kringle. The wife of the current Santa Claus, she is your typical housewife. She is sweet, but can lose her temper especially when it comes to her daughter.
She 5'7" and is in pretty good shape for being in her 40s. She is a little bottom heavy thou.

Jessica Kringle. She is Santa's only daughter. Unlike her mother, is an outspoken rebel but despite her rough and moody appearance she does have a good heart.
She is in her late teen and is 5'5". She had a slim, fit figure.

Sasha Marcel. She is a mean spirit girl who doesn't believe in Christmas. She is a bit of a bully and loves putting other people down.
She is 5'2" and has a nice hourglass figure.
13.title: Christmas

choices: Her dad retires, She's the new Santa.
Her mom thinks she's too thin
133.title: Jessica Kringle

1331.content:
Jessica was sitting on her bed, listening to her Ipod. Suddenly, A loud knock sounds from her door. She ignorance it. Suddenly the door burst open.

"Jess," the people who had just burst through her door wines.

"What is it, holly." Jess growled at the intruder as she took out the ear buds and blow a strand of chestnut hair out her eyes.

"Your father wants to see you." the elf said as jumped up in excitement.

"What about?"

"I don't know. But I don't care lets go." the elf shouted as grabbed Jess's hand and raced out the door.

         Minutes later the arrived at her fathers study. Holly ripped open the door and dragged her inside. Old Chris Kringle blinked in surprise. Finally getting Holly to let go, she noticed that her mother was also present. Taking a seat, she addressed her parents.

"So what did you want to see me about?" she asked annoyed.

"Jess, I have something to tell." she straightened up a little when she heard the seriousness in her father's voice. "This is my last Christmas as Santa."

"Okay, what does this have to do with me?"

"I'm passing the torch down to you."
1331.title: Her dad retires, She's the new Santa.

13311.content:
"I'm the new WHAT! " she shouted.

"The new Santa. I'm to old for the job. I need you to take over." He replied softly.

"But why me? "

"It runs through our veins. You are my only heir."

"Can't you find somebody else! "

"No it has to be you."

The group sat in silence. The room very tense and air shifed uncomfortably.

"Isn 't there any way out? "

"No."

Her head drooped, and she let out a sigh."What do I have to do? "

"Run the north pole, take care of the elves, deliver presents on christmas, and fit the mantle of Santa clause."

"What do you mean fit the mantel? "

He let out a sigh, "You have to look like Santa clause."

"WHAT, YOU MEAN GROW A BEARD, GET FAT, AND HAVE ALL MY HAIR TURN! "

"No, not the beard or the hair but you will have to gain weight." In an instance she rushed to the door and ran done the hall screaming " I won't do it."

Old Chris mingle just sighed.
13311.title: She freaks out

choices: Thanks holly, Jessica lets her stay
133111.content:
As Jessica rushed back to her room and jumped on to her bed. She grabbed her pillow at screamed into it "I won't become Santa Claus."

She screamed into her pillow for what seemed like hour. She screamed and cried til her throat was raw and her lungs burned. A loud knock resounded through her room before she throw her pillow at the door. "Go away!" She yelled hoarsely.

"No." Holly shouted back as she barged through her door. "You were totally uncool to your dad and I am not, like, going to let you sit here all alone." She softened to a gentle whisper at the end.
133111.title: Holly Day

133112.content:
She said as she walking through the hall "How i'm going become fatter to become a new santa claus?"

Then she stop & smell something yummy & said "Hmmmm. That smell is delicious. I think it coming from....."

15311.content: The Bensons were planning to go on a 3 week Caribbean Cruise. The family included John, the father, Stacy the mother, and Jordan, their 17 year old daughter. Jordans parents were quite hefty with her father at 250 and her mother at 200. Jordan was a little plump at 160 and 5ft, 6 in.

choices: Jorden notices something odd about this cruise
153112.content: When they arrived they were informed that their boat got delayed so they had to go on a different cruise ship. The boat was actually a bigger one with a lot more attractions on it and a lot more food because it was used to more people on it. When they got on the ship and into their room they saw that it was huge. Whole fridge, minibar, king size beds.
153112.title: problem with cruise

1532.content:
A fit mother is encouraged to lounge around all day while being offered huge amounts of food.

A fat mother with a voracious appetite uses mother's day to eat tons of food.
1532.title: mothers day

1533.content: Valentines Day is a day to show expression of love, affection, or just being good pals with someone. How's about it?
1533.title: Valentines Day

choices: Jenny pulls up a chair and helps feed Sasha
Jenny prepares the Starbucks portion of the surprise
15331.content:
“Dear, Big Butt.
Meet me at the cafeteria at midnight. Be sure to come with an empty stomach. There’s a surprise for you.”
- Love, Jenny

Big Butt is just a nickname. Gifted to Sasha by to her by her friends for having such a large rump for her size. Jenny and Sasha were coincidentally the same in height, stature, and interested, but Sasha AKA Big Butt happened to have a large rump.

At this late hour, the NSE (or the student center) is usually closed for the night, but one tug of the glass door enabled her entrance into the building. Sasha giggled at the above lighting that panned toward the stair way leading down toward the cafeteria, “Jenny probably won’t tell me what kind of strings she had to pull to do this.” Patiently, Sasha stepped her way down. With each step a delightful odor tickled her nose and teased her taste buds.

It was but a few days ago since Jenny had slipped that Valentine’s day card into her book bag after she left for class from the dorms. She had found it in the middle of lunch and quit eating then and there. Sasha knew that Jenny is one to keep a promise no matter how unnecessarily extravagant she made it.

“Happy Valentine’s Day, Sasha!” Jenny shot her hands in the air cheering as the rest of the cafeteria lit up behind her. Sasha’s red hair mixed with Jenny’s black hair as the two friends embraced each other.

“Behold,” All along the cafeteria tables were platters holding a bountiful feast. Normally Sasha would be of put by the massive amounts of food. Heart shaped donuts with pink frosting and sprinkles, cookies with the same decorations and shape, succulent cuts of meat, plump and juicy hot dogs, chicken sandwiches with cheese, strawberry milkshakes, and plenty more.

Jenny pulled out a chair in the middle of all of the food, “Take a seat, Big Butt! Let’s get this started!” To be honest, Sasha was frightened about the amount of food Jenny had prepared for her. However, the hopeful look Jenny shot her set her at ease. The additional cheering helped coax Sasha into taking the seat provided. Once her big rear was parked into the seat, Sasha grabbed a fork and had her eyes scale along the feast that Jenny scooted closer to her with a wanting smile.

Next…
15331.title: Valentines Day
